name: web-scraper
label: Web Scraper
description: Web scraping is data scraping used for extracting data from websites. This connector facilitates automated operations related to extracting data from websites.

operations.description: Extract the source code of the web page for the given URL
operations.title: Get Web Page Source

parameters.title: URL
parameters.name: url
parameters.description: Provide the URL of the web page for which you would like to extract a web page source code
parameters.tooltip: Provide the URL of the web page for which you would like to extract a web page source code

operations.description: Takes a screenshot of a web page and creates an attachment in the FortiSOAR Attachment module
operations.title: Get Web Page Screenshot

parameters.title: URL
parameters.name: url
parameters.description: Provide the URL of the web page for which you would like to take a screenshot
parameters.tooltip: Provide the URL of the web page for which you would like to take a screenshot
